name: wallpapers
title: Wallpaper Manager
description: Browse and set wallpapers using awww backend with grid view and random selection
author: soulvice

commands.name: browse
commands.title: Browse Wallpapers
commands.description: Browse wallpapers in a grid view and set as wallpaper

commands.name: random
commands.title: Random Wallpaper
commands.description: Set a random wallpaper from configured folders

preferences.name: wallpaperFolders
preferences.title: Wallpaper Folders
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of wallpaper folder paths

preferences.name: awwwNamespace
preferences.title: AWWW Namespace
preferences.description: Namespace for awww daemon (optional, for multiple daemon instances)

preferences.name: postWallpaperCommand
preferences.title: Post-Wallpaper Command
preferences.description: Command to run after wallpaper is set (optional)

preferences.name: imageExtensions
preferences.title: Image Extensions
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of image file extensions

preferences.name: gridColumns
preferences.title: Grid Columns
preferences.description: Number of columns in the wallpaper grid
